errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
sourcefolder: Source Folder to create Delta Package
gitcheckkey: (Optional) Key when using gitCheckKey with Build Tool
gitcheckkeycustom: (Optional) Custom Setting record name when using --customsettingobject, -c
customsettingobject: (Optional) Custom Setting API name when using custom one
valuecolumn: (Optional) Field Name Where hash is stored when using --customsettingobject, -c
